name: Leo Cat Ice Run - Frozen City
name_original: Leo Cat Ice Run - Frozen City
description:
Run, dodge, jump, and slide into an incredible winter adventure. 
Leo Catomy is a brave and spiteful cat that as the habit of getting himself in trouble. Your task will be to rescue him from the grumpy dog.
Rush through crowded cities, small villages, over big bridges and gather all the coins you can. 
While running, avoid hitting trucks, cars, buses or any other object that could either slow you down or stop you. Collect all the fun power ups to get further and to give the tireless dog the slip.

Forget the subway stations, temple and jungles - the world run of Leo Cat Ice Run - Frozen City await you!

Leo Cat Ice Run - Frozen City is one of the 841 best free 3D running games! If you like running games, cat games or cat simulator games then you will love the free and cool Leo Cat Ice Run - Frozen City game. Try it out and download Leo Cat Ice Run - Frozen City now!

How to play Leo Cat Ice Run - Frozen City:
- Try to dash so fast that you can smash the sonic wall ;-)
- Drag/swipe to jump or slide and to move left or right
- The power ups are activated automatically when you get them
- Buy new characters and upgrade power ups with the collected coins
Features:
- 9 Lovely cats to choose.
- Cartoon like environment with Leo Catomy
- Amazing power-ups: coin magnet, rocket, snowmobile, etc.
- Trucks, cars and buses to avoid!
- Lots of obstacles to dodge 
- Cool music

Special power- ups
- The rocket will make you fly at top speed over the obstacles and give you the opportunity to collect a lot of coins.
- The snowmobile will makes you faster, which will require all of your dodging abilities to not crush against something. If you hit something with the snow-mobile you will only lose the vehicle but still keep running.
- The skis give you the ability to make mega jumps and escape dangerous situations for some seconds.
You can buy much stronger snowmobiles with the collected coins.

If you like the game with Leo Catomy, please rate it with 5 stars on the store and invite your friends on facebook or google plus to join the pet race.
